Just then you see it, just over the grass tops, you see a dark soccer shape lit from beneath, kind of looking like a UFO. That had to be the bird-bath. You helped install the light under it, when your mom was in her land-scaping phase.

That is what you are going to head for…taking a deep breath you start moving. If you can get to the bird bath you are sure you can see the house from there. Good news was you know you are in the front back yard, which makes sense because Kelly’s room faces the back. You press on into the dark jungle….

111112121211213.content:
Shannon looks down at her handy work with a great big smile on her face. "Well Scott what should we do next?"

You find comfort in her calling you by name, but then it starts to turn your stomach as she keeps grinning and reaches down to pick you up.

"Maybe Sarah would have a good idea?" She stands there thinking for a moment dangling you in front of her face by one arm. You feel like your shoulder is going to go out of joint. You just keep swinging and swinging and Shannon is paused in thought. Her smile suddenly turns to confusion as she takes a closer look at you and notices something odd. "What's that?" She says, "Dolls are not supposed to have one of those."

You are starting to get some strength back now, after being thrown, stepped on, and beat on by your sister's butt. You look and see what she is looking at, your penis. You start to cringe as she brings her other hand up to you. Not to inspect you, but in a more horrifying position... and next thing you know... flick. Pain everywhere across your entire body centering in your nether regions.

Your instincts are confused, you try to curl up, but you can't because your body is extended being held up by one arm by your sister. As you are struck again, you start to swing a bit faster. Your sister's smile returns as she is finding more and more amusement from this simple little game. She decides to sit back on her bed and continue.

Shannon has no idea what she is doing to you, playing with her funny little "Doll". Flick...You make a little bit of noise this time, but Shannon is use to that and thinks it is kind of fun. She let's out a little giggle as she strikes you again and again. Your penis feels like it is going to fall off because of all the pain. Tears are starting to come from your eyes, but she doesn't notice. She is of course working on her aim and still thinking about what other kind of fun things she can do with you. As you swing back and forth faster now...flick.
111112121211213.title: Discovering New Games

choices: keep you for herself
put you in either Cathy's or Sarah's rooms for them to find
sell  you to or leave you at the petting zoo or a store
1111121213.content:
Shannon looked at you in her hand, her grip on you too tight to allow you to properly breathe, much less have the air needed to be able to speak.

"Now, how to to...oh! That's a fun idea of what to do with you, little doll!" your seven-year-old sister said, snapping the fingers of her free hand as an idea struck her.

Given how she wanted to torture and torment you, you knew you weren't going to like this at all!

Going over to her desk, she opens the drawer where she likes to keep the stuff she uses when she's playing with bugs. She always seemed a bit weird with how she treated bugs, but you digress. Seeing her dig through the drawer, she brightens as she pulls out a bottle of super glue.

Seeing it, your blood goes cold.

A quality super glue, such as Loctite Super Glue Liquid Professional (20g bottle), dries and sets in seconds. For full bond strength, the glue should be left undisturbed for at least 10 minutes. The glue will be fully cured in 24 hours.

This was bad!

Slamming you on your back onto her desk, Shannon started to put super glue over you body. Before you even have time to run, you are pummeled by tons and tons of this thick oily cream. You try to run but you just slip and fall into the pile more and more. "That's right, you'll need this!" you hear your seven-year-old sister say above you. Then her massive fingers fall around you and start to knead the gunk all over your body. Shannon then picks you up out of the gunk and raises you to her billboard-like face.

After she cleans the super glue off your face, you almost faint with blood rushing to your head as Shannon's arm swings back and forth while. Your sister walks towards a small closet, and when she opens it, you realize it is specifically for doll clothes.

"I'm not just some toy you can dress up!" You almost yell out, only to be shocked silent as Shannon pulled out a doll-sized, grey mouse costume with a white underbelly, mitten-style mouse paw gloves and full slipper-like shoes and it also had a hood that had round mouse ears while there was a hole for the wear's face to go through.

"Yes, this is perfect!" Shannon yells out, giving you a migraine. She skips back over to her desk, dropping you onto it's hard, wooden surface, stunning you.

Shannon picks you up by your left foot, leaving you hanging upside down as she laughed while forcing the mouse costume on you piece by piece. First the body, then the shoes, then the gloves, and finally, pulling up the hood over your head.

Next, Shannon takes a moment to knead your tiny body from center to arms, center to legs. The pressure, the mass pushing down on you was immense, causing you to gasp every time it left your chest, making sure the costume would be completely stuck and attached to your skin as closely as possible once the super glue dried so it couldn't be removed at all.

Not something you were looking forward to.

You whimper as tears prick at the edges of your eyes, the whole outfit presses into you and the way your current captor is treating you like an unfeeling object makes you want to cry in frustration.

"Cute! A nearly made-from-scratch mouse!" Shannon giggled as she beheld her modifications to you that she's done. "Now, I know you're a toy and can't move, but just to be sure...."

You didn't like the sound of that. And just why that happened to be was made clear as the next thing you knew was a massive fist descended upon you, seemingly at the speed of sound,force of the blow making you black out...

****

You awoke, gasping, and your body ached. Wha...oh, right, Shannon. So this was how rough she was with bugs and toys? Not fun...

But how long had you been out? While your body still ached, you could still move you eyes. Doing so, you looked at your demon of a little sister's clock. Then they widened in horror!

It had been twenty minutes! That meant you...and the glue and the costume...attached...your little sister had...!

NO! You were stuck in this...!

"What a cute little mousey-boy dolly!" You're attention was caught at the voice. Looking up, you nearly faint as, looming over you yet again with a pleased, unrepentant, mischievous smile on their face, was the giant monster, her smile widening as she saw her work complete. Blackness danced along the edges of your vision, then with a jerk, the wind was knocked out of you as Shannon snatched you up in her hand and slammed you into her chest as she squeezed you.

"Now what to do with you?" she wondered, tossing you into the air and catching you by the end of your new tail then started suddenly begin to swing and twirl you very fast in a circle by said appendage. As this happened, you felt sick, good thing there was nothing in your stomach right now or you'd have puked.

"I suppose I could keep you. Made the mouse-boy doll, keep the mouse-boy doll." Shannon said, talking to herself as she twirled you around, the words horrifying you!

"then again, I could leave you in either mom or Sarah's rooms to find and see what they do with you. Watching that could be funny."

At that, you pale. Your mother,Cathy, has always been a good mother, always caring about her kids. But she was a neat freak, and utterly loathed and loathed anything even remotely like creatures like mice! There'd be no way for you to have that end well for you! And Sarah...Well, what can you say about her? She's only three years old. But the idea of being in your current state and at the mercy of someone as young and not understanding of things as a giant toddler was just as dangerous as, if not moreso, being found by your mother with you sealed in this mouse suit!

"Or I could even sell you. There is that petting zoo a few blocks away. They could always use more animals, and such a cute little mouse would be adored there, especially by girls!" Shannon said, grinning at the notion, then frowned, "...Oh, wait, you're still person-shaped, dolly..." then she shrugged, "Guess if the petting zoo won't take you, I could sell you to a toy store, or even toss you into one of those weird stores that only grown-ups are allowed into so the people there can find and enjoy you!"

What was wrong with this girl?! Your sister had never been like this before! But hearing what she was saying, you were horrified! Did the second of your sisters hate you THAT much?!

Finally stopping spinning you around, Shannon made up her mind as she dangled you as she decided to....
1111121213.title: Made A Mouse

1111122.content: You keep walking and making your way through the giant forest of grass. You stop by a huge blade of grass and ketch your breath. How far have I walked you think to yourself. Man it shouldn’t be this far. You turn around and lean against the blade and close your eyes. When you open them you jump up in terror…a giant ant stands right in front of you. It looks at you and you look at it. The monster is at least half the size of you. But to your relief it doesn’t try to eat you. After your little stand off goes on for about a minute it turns and goes away. Thank you, you whisper to yourself. Then you hear a rumble and turn around to see a wave of dirt falling your way.
1111122.title: Hike

choices: Stay where you are
Try to make a run for it
11111222.content:
The dirt flies over you and the giant ant is gone from your mind as you run to get out of the way. Dirt and dust falls on top of you and everything goes black. You wake up and feel yourself surrounded…buried in dirt. Fortunately it isn’t so deep and you are able to move and shift until you feel your back side and left arm reaching freedom of movement. Slowly you are able to lift yourself from what could have been your own tiny grave. You catch your breath and cough out what dirt that got into your mouth and shake and dust yourself off. The next thing you know the ground is vibrating and a huge tower lands feet from you. You fall on your bottom and look up from the ground and fallow it up to see a white canopy what seems life fifty stories up. You look back down and round and count four such towers all holding up the canopy, a table. The ground vibrates again and in the distance you see another set of towers set down in between the ones already standing. This one is lower but also white. Your mind quickly makes sense of this, a chair, white plastic chairs and table. You don’t have white plastic yard furniture…Mrs. Coodly does.

Damn you went the wrong way; you were in that creepy lady’s yard. “DANIEL, WERE ARE THE OTHER CHAIRS!?” a booming voice yells you look around trying to find the giant you know is speaking. Strange that that concept isn’t so foreign anymore. The grass around you blocks much of your view from anything that isn’t close to you. But you find it, two huge light tan flats were about 30 feet from you and you could see up out of them were two tree trunk legs that disappeared in a long dark green skirt that must have been about ankle or right above in length. You would have missed them except the grass in that section was shorter and trampled. You were already thinking tactically measuring distance and memorizing what made up what. Being in danger for the last day must have triggered your natural survival sense. Everything could kill your or help you.

The giant tan shoes turns and moved away in several giant steps out of your sight. They left with a BOOM, BOOM, and BOOM. You sat down for a moment. You caught your breath for the time being you were safe. That must have been Mrs. Coodly, you recall seeing her in an outfit like that a week or so ago when she and her husband came over to spend time with your mom and Aunt Donna. Daniel, their daughter had come along too. You remembered thinking she was hot because she had been wearing these hip huger jeans and a white t-shirt that showed she was wearing no bra. She was about 19 or so and unlike her mom with the short bright orange straight hair she had these dark black curls that flowed over her shoulders and these huge lips.

As you recall the memories you think about getting back to your side before what ever is going on here happens to make life too difficult. You are about to get up when the booming starts coming back. You look around trying to find where it is coming from. The grass around the table’s legs distorts your view for any great distance until almost right on you from behind a wall of spongy white material lands. You jump back and face the wall and run backwards to get some distance. After a few feet are between you and it you see it is a monster size flip-flop. Then to your right you can see the green shirt and some legs above the grass line.
11111222.title: Under The Table

choices: You are now close to the center of the yard where guests are congregating
You made it closer to the fence but have been running parallel to it
111112222.content:
Mrs. Brenda Coodly set down another set of white plastic chairs. She walked back to the deck and made sure the caterers were setting up the mini bar and to snag an early shot of tequila. Brenda put her glass back down and saw her lovely daughter set up another table with table cloth and a caterer helped her pull the cover over it. She didn’t miss the young man touch Daniel’s arm and say something to her after they finished. Daniel’s head fell back in a short but flirtatious laugh. Her hair fell over her shoulders and settled into place.

Brenda smiled, ah to be young again. She remembered the time she was that young. There had been a young man back then too, thinking about that actually drew a picture of the neighbor’s boy, Scott, handsome young man. Brenda mused as she walked back to the table and continued to place chairs down. Guests would be arriving shortly. It was a meeting of an induction committee to welcome in the new members to the Country Club she and her husband belonged to. Normally such events were at the club but the committee chairman felt that someone’s home would be a more personable touch. And like any good member of the committee Brenda Coodly couldn’t say no. Of course Mr. Coodly would be flirting with the young bartender long before the official party started.

You get up and start moving back the way you came, or you think it is. The long blades of grass make it difficult to tell where you are. Another shadow comes over you and Boom a giant black wall lands another few feet in front of you. You look up a long black pants leg to the giant, ah not again. You make a break left but this time are face with the white spongy wall again but when you look strait up you get a reward because you see right up the tan legs and up the dress of who must be Daniel. Cool, your mind whispers but the moment is short lived because you once again start moving again and run around the giant flip-flop and between the giant legs. You must have run for 35 minutes but there is no telling where you are now, closer to the fence or farther, the grass obstructs any view of what is above you. More noises are filling the air but you can’t make any of them out.
111112222.title: Mrs. Brenda Coodly

choices: You fall and land in Mrs Coodley's hair
You fall and land on Daniel's head
Something else
1111122222.content:
You are dog tired and your lungs are gasping for air. You stop and lean against a blade of grass to catch your breath. That was a long hard run. With out warning your stomach starts to growl. Oh man when was the last time I ate you think to yourself? No time for that though you know you need to get going again and soon. If the last few hours have taught you anything it is don’t stop moving for too long.

You try to look around but the grass is just too high and you can’t see anything. How are you going to find out where you are? You start in the direction you were in before and at a quick walk you keep your head up for any sign of the fence…or any danger. The last thing you want is for Daniel to show up again but this time crush you into the ground.

You keep going but there is no sign of the fence or anything. There is the noise of what must be people behind you but that seems so far off. You keep walking, any place is better than being near more giants.

As you keep going a red wall starts to come into sight above the grass skyline. You head towards it slowly until you are right up next to it. It is a hard porous wall. A brick, it must be. Where did you go?

You don’t know this but you have found yourself in the Coodly’s backyard. And the wall in front of you is one of the many bricks that make up their back patio.

Well there doesn’t seem to be much choice. Maybe if you get on top you can see where the damn fence is? Fortunately the many holes and crevices within the brick’s side make the climb very easy. If it wasn’t for the fact that you were completely naked and your stomach was growling every 10 minutes it almost could have been fun. You make it up past the grass and finally reach the top. It must have been about 25 or 30 feet from the ground, to you which isn’t that high to a normal person.

You sit on the edge and catch your breath. As you rest your head scans all around you and you are able to finally see the white fence. It looks to be several miles away but it is there. You just have to get down and then head that way. Once there you could figure out how to get back into your house.

You sit there contemplating a way to cross the miles of grassy forest. You become so engrossed in your ideas of how to be big again and to get attention that your mind isn’t paying attention to your surroundings. If it had you would have noticed the giant sparrow staring at you from a few yards away. With out warning the “small” bird leaps into the air and scoops you up by the arm with its beak. DAMN!

You scream as the giant bird swoops down on you and grabs your arm then takes off again dragging you with it, up, up, higher and higher. “OWWWWWWWWWWW!” you scream and start punching at the bird’s head, POW, POW, POW, then with one more jab you strike the feather monster’s eye and it lets go and you drop…
1111122222.title: The BIRDS

choices: At the drink table you fell forward into a wine glass
At the table you try to jump off but loose your balance when Brenda leans over
11111222221.content:
You free fall screaming. “AHAHAHAHAHAHAH!”, there is no way to stop your decent. Your life flashes through your eyes, fights with your sisters, going to the movies with Kim, Mom’s hugs…the divorce. You know you are going to die and close your eyes as the wind whips around you…
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Brenda was greeting her guests as they arrived. Mrs. Avian guided her husband towards Mrs. Coodly. Sally Avian was the president of the committee and a scandalous flirt and rumor monger. She was supposedly in her 50s but with all of her husband’s money she spent on surgery, face, lips, and other endowments, made her look at most 10 years younger. She also clearly died her hair a deep yellow blond though the roots showed dark and gray. She also was wearing several large sets of jewels including a draping set of precious stones with small fingerings between intervals. Kind of an Aztec or mid America design, she also was showing of draping earrings that looked like they weighed lbs. each along with large rings and bracelets. There was a thing such as too much but that was lost on Sally Avian. “Brenda, Dear, how have you been?”

“Oh, wonderful,” Brenda Coodly placed spill on her face. “So lovely to see…” she stopped in mid sentence feeling something hit the top of her head. She reached for her hair at the same time looking up to see if there was a rain cloud or something. All she saw was a bird fly away. For a moment she feared the bird might have let its droppings fall on her.

“Brenda?” Sally asked faking a worried look.

Brenda looked back down and ran her hand through her hair then back so she could see it. Nothing, thank good ness. She smiled bat Sally, “Nothing, just thought I felt a rain drop but look, not a cloud in the sky.” Sally smiled…

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

You hit on something but it wasn’t the ground and you didn’t go splat like you expected. You are sprawled out on…something. You grab at long red rope like strands taking bunches into you hands. Just in time too because the floor shift and you are clinging to hang on. A moment later something lands in front of you. Then as the surface once again levels out you see whatever it is sweeping towards you. Grabbing on with one hand you let go and move over just as the giant thing is about to pass bye spilling a wave of the red strands over you burying you.

You hang on where you are as the surface shifts, turning and you hear indistinguishable booming voices. You are afraid to move too much but you have no choice but to try and crawl out and find out where you are. But you do it slowly and consciously. You poke your head out form your cover. And to your surprise you are looking down at a giant woman with huge blond hair and giant red lips even for a giant. Another sudden movement happens and you or to be more precise the surface spins around to face two new giants a man wearing a dark gray suit and a woman that looks like she was dressed for tie with the queen of England. What the hell?

There are more sounds… But you take no interest trying to look for a way off this, you guess it is a person and try to see the fence back to your yard and hopefully home. You manage to see it but then are turned around and whoever this is starts going into the wrong direction. You crawl a bit forward tying to stay hidden but also not alert this person that you are up here. The last thing you want is to be found like this by some stranger.
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Brenda heads over to the bar to get a drink. She hates these odious people but at the same time she couldn’t imagine life without her social status and her other responsibilities. She looks down to grabs a glass of wine and sips it. Daniel comes up to her. “Uh, Mom, I’m heading out, see yah.”

“Have fun dear.” Brenda gives her daughter a hug then watches her walk off. More guests arrive and before long it is time to sit at the tables wile opening presentations start. As the hostess Brenda has to honor of also being seated with the President as well as the other officers of the committee and Social Club. Sitting at the table she smils and listens to Sally talking about her new necklass as it rests around her all too revieled bust line. Brenda looks down to inspect the neclice politly as expected to fane interest.
11111222221.title: Big RED

A server picks up the glass and many others onto a tray (moves around the party
111112222211.content:
You figured out you were on someone's head just as it dipped forward. There had been no time to grab onto the rople like strangs of hair. You tried reaching out as you flipped over and tumbled over. Then you were free falling...

It lasted less then a second, your eyes tightly shut out of instinct SPLASH. You hit water, sharp bighting needle like spikes hit all over your skinn then your sank, submerging over your head. You kicked your legs, reaching for the surface, for air. Breaking free your eyes opened and instantly were stinging, and your mouth opened wide taking in air and a rich, bitter taste. You fell back and went under again but this time not as far.

Finally you came up again and this time stayed up treding 'water'. You open your eyes. Blinking away the sting you see clear glass walls around you. Turning around, kicking your feet you look around and see that your are surrouned and up it curves in like a bowl. Focusing you see beyond hte clear glass more giants. Mrs. Cooley, your neighbor was infront of you. She looked distorted through the glass but you could see it was her and how big she was...again you realized how small you really were. Turning again you see who is with her. A shorter woman in a long white dress with large blond hair...the woman that you noticed earlier, the one with the big big lips.

It was only taking moments but you were panting...treding the liquid to keep up was getting harder...You still had the taste in your mouth...WINE! Realizing that you turned and tried to see beyond the glass all around you. There was a white plane and many many glass trees with red liquid in them. Red wine...

You have no time to think of getting out shen the contents of your glass bowl shift and you are doused with red wine...
111112222211.title: Red Wine

choices: You fell to the ground but were covered beneath Sally's dress when she steipped
You fell into the augmented boobs of Mrs Sally (think Dolly Parton)
1111122222111.content:
The red liquid washes over you and you go under...Breaking back to the surface you kick staying up and wipe your face. Then you open them feeling the current. You stare shocked and stare as you are being brought to the biggest set of lips you have ever seen. And the glass it tipping!


Sally picked up a glass from the table. "Oh I do so enjoy these parties. The compeny is delightful and the beverages are always top of the line." She gives Mrs. Cooley a gentile salute with her new glass and takes a sip.


Instantly you start kicking and paddling trying to pull away and fight the current but it is no use. Everything slows down and you turn seeing yourself getting closer and closer. You kick out actually hitting the soft red flesh. then to your relief everthing moves away and you and the rest of the wine slosh back into the glass.

You are stunned but alive. Drinched and gasping for breath, chocking on the strong wine you panic. You nearly were swollowed hole, and there was nothing you could have done...how, how could this have been hapening? What...what were you going to do?


Sally moved around the party. She smiled and chit chatted. Many complemented her shade of lipstick...which agmented her already agmented lips. They of course were so numb that she couldn't feel a thing but she had practiced smiling enough to know she was. She took another sip of her wine.


You tried to get out but the brim was to high. And the constant sloshing wasn't helping. Then to your terror the glass was tipping again. You trited to cling to the sides and swim away but it wasn't working and you went back to the maw of those parted lips.

You fought as hard as you could but slowly you were going in. It was at the last moment the lips came closed and their soft firm wals sealed - over your foot. The glass moved away but you dragged back saging. In that instant you fell and hit a pale fleshy wall (Sally's chin) and the next you were plumeting.


Sally just wipped her chin when the woman she was talking to, a Anne Hastings, blinked and commented "Sally, what was that?"

"What was what, Dear?" Sally asked.

"For the briefest moment I swear I saw something dangling from your mouth...just now but it fell away." Anne began looking down to the ground. So did Sally.

"Well I don't see anything," Sally said she steped forward and to the side but saw nothing but the grass. Looking back to Anne, "Realy, Dear, perhaps you've had too much to drink. Maybe you need to sit down a bit."

"Maybe..." Anne agreed
1111122222111.title: Down the Hatch

Freeze in Fear
Something else

Then you see her giant foot coming down towards you. You roll over just in time but before you can move your hand her foot comes down and crushes it. You yell out in extreme pain but she doesn't here you. She thens lifts her foot.....
11112.title: Run For It

choices: Mom walks to the pool
Mom stumble and you get a chance to get out, or get hurt
111121.content:
You grab your throbbing hand. Oh the pain, you can’t move it and you can see it is red and swelling. You hear the THUMP, THUMP of Kelly’s walking and without looking you just run for any shelter you can. In the corner of your eye you see a large black cave like thing, out of panic you run and dive into it as your sister’s giant feet stamp past. You hide in the darkness and gasp for air from your panicked run. You cradle your hand and try to move it. I burns with pain and feels raw and large with the swelling of blood. Your fingers move and you figure it isn’t broken but should still be put on ice which is the least of your problems right now.

You get your breath and look around you. You are in what you guess is a shoe because it is soft and a little musky in here. But the thing is you dived into it with out climbing in. You can tell it isn’t turned over and you look out into the light of the room. There is no back to this shoe; your sister doesn’t have any shoes that you’ve noticed without backs. Move thumping comes and you see two giant feet in white ankle socks stand outside your hiding place. You are by no means an expert on feet but you know those aren’t Kelly’s feet, you got up close and personal with those and these are way bigger.

“HONEY, WHERE ARE MY BROWN MULES?” Your mom! “OH HERE THEY ARE NEVER MIND.” You stare in horror as the giant white clad foot turns and plunges into your hiding place. “Mom stop…” You try to get away but it isn’t any use you are hit by the wall of white cotton and shoved to the toe section of the mule.

Cathy slipped on her shoes casually and walks out of Kelly’s room. “Honey, have you seen your brother?” “NO!” Kelly calls from the living room. “Okay, I’m taking Shannon to the pool and meet up with your Aunt Donna and some friends, you be good and take care of Sarah.” “Okay, Mom, bye.”

Cathy grabs a towel out of the closet and then reaches up high to get her swimming cap, she rarely used it but you never know, she had to get on her tippy-toes to reach which nearly crushed poor Scott. “Okay bye? Shannon, come’ on, Sweetie.” Cathy walks out of the house and down the street with Shannon right behind.
111121.title: Run And Hide (Bad Idea)

choices: She wiggles her toes to flatten what she thinks is just a tear in the insole
She takes her shoes and socks off - she's going into the pool
1111211.content:
Cathy walks out of the house with Shannon in her arms, humming casually, she begins to stroll down the sidewalk on the way to the community pool. As she makes her way she smiles at the neighbors and they smile back, completely unaware of the terror that goes on below, inside something as innocent as a shoe.

You try to scream as you're thrown up and down, but all that does is allow the cotton from Cathy's sock to be forced down into your mouth. Tears stream down your cheeks are you thrash about, desperately trying to get your mothers attention. With each step, you are smothered with the stifling sock and you fear for your life. Up and down. Up and down. Each footstep feels like an earthquake and the heat is making you dizzy.

Cathy arrives at the pool gates where Donna and some other friends are waiting. Cathy begins to talk to them about current events and such. As they stand and gossip Cathy lifts the foot that holds you prisoner and slams it down before engaging in shoe play.

Meanwhile, you feel the walking stop and take the time to start thrashing again. Nothing. Or at least, nothing you want to happen. The shoe prison lifts up and then slams down with deafening force, knocking the air from your body, then her gigantic foot begins to exit the shoe slightly, allowing some air and light in. You desperately try to gulp in air, and that's when the smell hits you. Your mother's foot is starting to smell a bit, but to you the sharp foot odor hits you like a ton of bricks. The foot slides slightly from the shoe but then plows back in, burying you under tons of flesh and cotton and then suddenly more walking.

Cathy and her friends sit down as they prepare the kids to have some fun in the pool. As Cathy sits and talks she feels a little disturbance in her shoe...
1111211.title: Under Mom's Foot

choices: Cathy gets up to use the bathroom and decides to get changed in the looker room
Cathy thinks there's a rock in her shoe and takes it off to shake it (Hard)
11112111.content:
Cathy is sitting at a small table in the shade with her best friend Karen, older sister Donna, her coworker Halley Jones, and Jessie Belies who was a friend of Donna’s daughter Rachel and sometimes babysat Shannon and Sarah for Cathy when she had to work late or Scott and Kelly were busy with other teenager things.

Cathy and Donna watched their children play in the pool and talked about a variety of things, including Karen’s new found enjoyment of dance clubs, and Donna’s new social life since she got her hair died almost a red as Karen’s and her breasts enlarged. Cathy joked that if Donna wasn’t careful she might turn out like their younger sister Megan. Both women laughed. Jessie talked about her new boy friend and all the older women thought back to when they were young and dating, oh if only to dream.

While all this chit chat is going on up above, down below Scott is not have any fun at all. The giant foot had shifted and now ever few seconds the big toe would slam down on him and grind him into the sole. He couldn’t breath and when he tried to block it with his arms they were smashed down and nearly shattered by the shear force of the massive wall of cotton and flesh. What did his mom think he was some pebble or something in her shoe? He was bruised and battered and his mind was trying to get his body to get out of the way but there just wasn’t any time. WAMB…WAMB…WAMB again and again.

Cathy felt the small tear in her insole and tried repeatedly to place it back into place with her big toe but for some odd reason it just wouldn’t fit back in. As she and Karen talked about how they should go out on a girls night out perhaps pick up some studs at a bar, just joking of course she started pivoting her entire foot onto the front of the sole and try to smash the torn material back into place. She never in a million years would have guessed she was trying to grind her beloved eldest child into the sole of her foot.
11112111.title: A Tear In The Insole, Oh Wait Its Scott

choices: You land in the lap of either Karen or the babysitter (Jessie Belies)
You fall into the hot tub
Somewhere else
111121112.content:
Cathy slams her foot down several times but the bump in her shoe doesn’t go away. As Halley is talking about that no good ex-husband of hers and how it was so hard to meet someone…Cathy reaches down and takes off her shoe with the rock or pebble in it. She lifts it up with the opening upside down and starts to shake…shake…

The wall of cotton and flesh just keeps beating down on top of you and you feel as if your ribs are going to break. It is only by sheer luck that you managed to get to a spot where the toes curl but that isn’t much. The sole of the shoe is also semi soft after all the walking and has been able to give where you needed it most but not much. Then with out warning like you ever get one your abuser pulls back and you feel air come in and light stings your sensitive eyes. Thank…you were about to think when the world starts spinning. The walls turn and you are flung to the hole but this time it is turning upside down. You grab onto the tong and hold onto the small holes of the fiber material lining the shoe and just hang there. You turn around and see a drop all the way down to a hard concrete floor…you hold on even harder determined not to fall. Then…

Cathy shook the shoe again and again trying to make sure what ever was in there would come out but nothing fell. She then reaches her hand in to feel around…

Your fingers are growing tired and you know you won’t last much longer then WAMB you are sent rolling back into the shoes and as you tumble about you see the giant monster hand waving around with each finger bigger than you swinging wildly and ever so often those powerful members hit you with the force of a brick…

Cathy still can’t find anything so she withdraws her and gives the mule one more shake…

You are relived when the giant hand pulls away but before you can brace yourself the shaking starts again and you have no way to grab onto anything. Fear grips your heart as you see yourself falling toward the opening and then into the light, “AAAAHHHHHHHH!” you scream as you go sailing into the air…
111121112.title: Get Out Of Your Mother's Shoe!

choices: Who comes back, Cathy or Karen?
What is Scott doing?
11112112.content:
Cathy slips her shoes back on and heads into the women’s looker room. She passes several people as she makes her way to the lockers. “I think I’ll join you,” Karen, Cathy’s best friend says as she comes in after her. The two women gossip as they turn the corner. Cathy scrunches her toes again feeling the annoying bump in shoe.

She sits on a bench in front of the lockers and with a single swing of her leg flips her shoes off. Karen sits down next to her and starts to take off her cloths as well. Cathy notices the pedicure instantly, “My you are treating yourself. Planning on attracting some young thing?” Cathy teases.

“Yup, young men just have so much more energy and they so love to play.” Karen laughs and opens a bottom locker.

Cathy gets up and pulls over her top and then bra and lets them both fall to the ground at her feet and then also bends over to open a bottom locker. She picks up the mules and her clothing and tosses them carelessly into the locker. The she gets up and reaches for her bag and pulls out a one peace bathing suit.

Karen uses her foot and kicks her locker closed and shows off her bikini. It left little to the imagination and looked like her breasts would snap out of it at any moment. Her red hair matched the bathing suits color perfectly. “Okay, now you are just showing off…” Cathy said admiring her friend’s figure.

Both women laughed as they stood up and put on their flip-flops and headed towards the showers.

“Oh I forgot my towel,”…
11112112.title: Getting Changed

choices: Karen stops her
Cathy plunges right in...
111121122.content:
The hot, stuffy world of inside Cathy's shoe is getting worse by the second which each step she takes. Your mother enters the locker room, her titanic sock-clad foot smashing into you over and over. All you can make out through the walls of the mule is gossip between the two women and it's driving you mad.

Suddenly, as if Cathy could hear your anger and is punishing you, your prison tightens up even more as her toes scrunch you up. You scream out, thinking you're about to be crushed, but that causes the cotton from the sock to be forced into your open mouth. Cathy's toes settle once again around you, leaving you to gag on the giant strand of fabric.

The gossip continues and then suddenly the prison begins to shake violently, and light filters in! Your mother is finally taking her shoe off. You are dragged along on the bottom of the leather and then begin to lift up with her foot. Scared of falling, you grasp onto the bottom of her sock and look around as you rise up, seeing the locker room and your mother's friend Karen. You try to scream and shot out for help, but you lose your hold and begin plummeting from the giant foot to the floor below.

You cringe, expecting to be splattered on tile floor but instead hit a firm yet yielding navy blue surface. The ground beneath you is particularly darkened with bits of dirt (the size of pebbles to you) here and there. As you struggle to get to your feet you look to the right of you and notice the same sort of surface, with a massive strap rising from...

a flip flop! You've landed on your mother's flip flop! It takes some time to register, but you remember seeing these before. The faint odor of Cathy's feet hang over these shoes. You stand up, seeing Karen's gigantic feet in the distance, sliding out of their flats and onto the tile floor with a heavy thud that knocks you on your butt. You notice Karen's feet are well kept, with painted toenails.

Looking up, you see your mom's face staring down at you and you begin jumping up and down and shouting.

"Mom! Mom! I'm down here! Help!!"

"MY YOU ARE TREATING YOURSELF! PLANNING ON ATTRACTING SOME YOUNG THING?"

Cathy's voice booms down like thunder and you realize that she's not looking at you at all, she's admiring her friend's pedicure. After Karen's reply you see your mom's shirt and bra fall down to the ground with a loud whump. You look up but immediately regret; you don't want to see her topless!

You get up and get ready to find a place to hide when a shadow falls over you. You were so distracted that you forgot you were on a shoe. Cathy's bare foot slides onto the massive sandal and you get slammed between her big and second toes, crushed into the separator that the strap is attached to.

The two women continue their conversation, oblivious to the human suffering beneath them as they head out to the pool. Suddenly Karen booms up from above "I FORGOT MY TOWEL" and goes back. Cathy however keeps going and before you know it you're at the edge of the pool.

Between the strap separator and her big toe, you wince and struggle to move or do anything to get out of this predicament. But your mom seems to dictate your fate at this point and as she kicks off her flip flops you remain stuck to the side of her toe. You look down in horror as the water approaches you swiftly and then suddenly you are plunged under.

Cathy simply dipped her foot in the water to see how cold it was, but to you it was like you were submerged in the ocean. The giant foot is pulled out from the depths, and you were lucky you weren't washed away. The chlorine assaults your senses and you begin screaming again to your mom, desperate to get her attention. Cathy simply lifts her foot over the pool, getting ready to get in...
111121122.title: No Escape From Mom's Foot Just Yet

choices: Tina comes to chat with the ladies
Cathy just wants to grab her daughter and leave
1111211221.content:
You gulp in air and try to prepare yourself for the watery death. You are raised into the air again and dive for the ocean like water. SPLASH, you are instantly submerged into the cold water and try with all your strength to hold your breath, you want to live, don’t let me die like this you beg your mother but she is oblivious to the consequences of her actions. But then as suddenly as you were sentenced to die you are pulled out of the water and once again brought to rest on solid concrete.

Above you thunderous voices bellow, “CATHY, I’M SO SORRY. I DIDN”T KNOW THEY WERE COMING.”

You struggle to look up but can’t see past the tree trunk of your mother’s leg. Karen has returned you can tell because of her voice and by looking to the side you see the painted toe-nails resting on red flip-flops. You try to squeeze your way out while your mom’s foot is wet but it doesn’t last as with immense speed and force you are once again soaring through the air and WAMB are compressed between Cathy’s big toe and the separator of her flip-flop.

Cathy felt rage, how dare he? Todd, her ex-husband and his tramp of a girlfriend, Tina, had shown up. That bastard, wasn’t enough that he left her for that child of a woman but he had to flaunt her to the whole neighborhood. And their daughter was here to see it!
1111211221.title: Saved But Still Stuck

choices: Scott flys up to hit the dashboard
Scott flys up and back to fall between the seats, where he wanted to be
Somewhere else
11112112212.content:
Cathy doesn’t bother going back to change. As quickly as possible she goes to get her daughter and wants to leave right away. She scoops up her little girl and as fast as she can walk in flip-flops head out.

“Hey, wait,” Karen comes running up. “Wait a second, you forgot your keys in the locker” she is carrying Cathy’s cloths and things including her shoes. “Let me drive you,” Karen offers as any good friend would. Cathy after a moment nods yes.

Without any warning you are slammed back against the rubber separator and a vice of flesh comes around you sealing you in. Your arms are even pinned. You can’t breath and then Up and SLAM down UP, SLAM down. The world is spinning and you can’t hold it int. Your already empty stomach let lose and you vomit into the air. UP, SLAM. You can’t maintain consciousness as droplets the size of your head fly by from your mom’s temporary dip into the pool.

Cathy gets into the passenger seat after securing Shannon in the back. With out thinking she flips her flip-flops off her feet and they fall against the back of the foot section under the dashboard. Karen gets into the driver seat and starts up the car. “To bad,” she says absentmindedly but really is talking to Cathy.

“What?” Cathy asks, she isn’t in the mood for Karen’s jokes right now.

“You would have looked hot in that bathing suit.” Karen smiles trying to lighten the mood.

“Karen!” Cathy says, trying to stifle the unwanted laugh, “Shannon is in the car.” Cathy spars a look at her daughter who is just ignoring them in protest to being taken from the pool so early.

“You know she is seven right?” Karen asks as she puts the car in drive and heads off.
++++++++++++++++++

You snap awake and in incredible pain. Your back hurts like hell. Slowly you open your eyes and your hands reach for the back of your head and lower back. Hey, wait my hands are free, I’m out, you realize. For a blessed moment since you have been in this hell you are free. Then you notice you are in some shady place with a rubber floor and you look straight ahead and see two giant bare feet crossed no more than twenty feet from you. Rolling over you slowly get up. There is a loud noise coming from beneath you and you hear the indistinguishable sounds above mix with the noise below. You have no idea what is going on.

The floor is vibrating and you have trouble keeping your balance. Slowly you look around and see two giant platforms that you became way to familiar with already. Wanting to get away from them you risk venturing closer to the giant feet that you assume is your mom but you can’t see very far up the giant ankle and leg. You manage to walk unsteadily despite the floor moving and your back around the feet and see that you are in some kind of hole or…a car seat, the room between the dashboard and feet room. Okay, I figured this out. That wall to your right though you can’t see over it is where the driver probably has the arm rest.

Then an idea comes to you. The rubber is just a mat over the fuzzy upholstery of the base of the car’s interior. If I can climb up, you think, to the arm rest I can be seen and no way can I be stepped on or trapped. OW, a stabbing of pain get into your back side. You go to your knees and take a breather. Too fast, I’m moving to fast, you say to yourself. How long has it been since you heard the sound of your own voice besides screaming?

After a short break you feel the vibrations from the floor getting slower. Maybe Mom is ready to get out soon, I got to getup there, you think to yourself with determination. You force yourself to work through the pain and start taking hold of the fuzzy and stringy material and start climbing up trying to get to the seats above and the arm rest. Whose car is this if mom isn’t driving?

You are so close to the top and your arms are dead tired and your back is screaming for mercy. So close you tell yourself, keep going. You ignore the fact that you are only a few feet from your mom’s giant thighs right behind you. You keep going up then STOP, the car comes to a halt and you go flying in the recoil…
11112112212.title: Cathy Leaves Angry, Poor Scott

Scott goes flying and hits the window. He was knock out consciousness. He lands on the dash board back first. Cathy seen something flying, she ask Shannon

You weren’t able to hold on. Your hands break free and you go out then SLAM! You didn’t see it coming, you hadn’t even fallen you were going up but your back side hits hard against a wall and all the air is forced from your lungs. Your head snaps back and everything goes black. Your eyes open up just so you can see the bash surface rising fast to meet you as you fall POW!
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Karen had to hit the brakes hard as a crazy driver swerves in front of them. Cathy immediately puts her hand back to protect Shannon out of a mother’s instinct despite the fact that they were all in their seat belts. Neither woman noticed the one inch object fly up to hit the dash then fall down into the cup holder of the arm-rest.
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ +

You aren’t unconscious but you’re already hurt back feels even worse. Your head hurts and it is hard to get any sense of balance. You slowly rise to your hand and knees feeling the pebbled plastic all around you. You blink, once, twice, three times for your vision to clear. “What the hell…”
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ++

“Ass Hole!” Karen yells out without thinking.

“Karen!” Cathy says. She looks back at Shannon who is oblivious to the whole thing. She is still sulking because of the pool.

“Sorry, but these Granny drivers are hell.”

“Mommy, can I have a drink.” Shannon chooses that moment to ask.

“Sure sweets.” Cathy says and looks for something to give her. There is a bottle of water in Karen’s bag. Karen uses her free hand to get it out and offer it to Cathy who then gives it to Shannon. Shannon takes a sip then hands it back to her mom.
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ +++

You hear something above you then look up to see a giant bare arm reach over and across. You manage to stand up on your wobbly feet despite your lack of balance and the still moving vehicle. There are now walls all around you in some kind of confined space. What is it?
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ++++

Cathy takes the bottle back and takes a drink herself. Without looking she closes the bottle and casually places it into the arm-rest cup holder.
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ +++++

You are turning around trying to gage the height of the walls when a shadow falls over you. You instantly look up to see a see through circular object falling then BAM! You are smacked head first then plowed to the floor as something large and unmovable falls and rests on top of you. You are once again flat on your back but your cheeks and chest are being pressed down on but not crushed. You can’t see it but the bottle was just too big to fit all the way into the holder. Condensation starts to bild up between the cold water bottle and your warm body.

Cathy rests her arm on the rest and her hand around the bottle blocking out most of the light. She has no idea how close her only son is.
111121122122.title: Trapped In The Cup Holder

choices: Cathy trys to force the water bottle in the cupholder
Cathy finds a toy under the bottle

Scott is thinking this can be over for him then all the weight was lifted over him in one moment. Scott felt free to move but the pain was too much he didn't want to move.

Karen was getting thirsty and grab the water bottle to drink. Scott realize that if he didn't move the bottle would come crashing down again. It was hard for Scott to get up because of the beating and soreness. But he was too late he seen the water bottle coming towards him and landed on his belly with his head sticking out of the bottle.

Karen took a long gulp and place the bottle back in the cup holder. She notice that the bottle wasn't in right like something was under it.

" Hey Cathy can you put this bottle in right i dont want it to fall down under my seat when i turn. "
1111211221221.title: Scott's Still Stuck

11112112212211.content:
You struggle to breath and try pushing up with all your might. Your body feels like it is literally being pressed down flat. Using all your strength you try doing a push-up to lift just a bit of the tankard above you. The edge of the bottle is resting just above your neck and it is squeezing. You feel your pulse pounding in your temples and your eyes feel like they are going to burst out of your head. What made it all the worse was that you can see the ginormous thigh and arm of your mother still in her bathing suit. Help is so close but there is nothing you can do. The woman you could always have depended on, should be able to depend on was right there and had the power to help you but there was no way to reach her.

“HEY CATHY CAN YOU PUT THIS BOTTLE IN RIGHT I DON’T WANT IT TO FALL DOWN UNDER MY SEAT WHEN I TURN!”

You heard the booming words but they didn’t register with you right away. A giant hand rises from beneath you and nearly takes your head off with a long red thumbnail as it goes beyond your line of sight. “MOM, HELP” you scream.

Cathy reaches up to the arm rest and takes the canted bottle with her left hand. She lifted it up with out looking then pushed it back down firmly setting it in the confines of the plastic holder and twists it to make sure it is secure. She doesn’t even need to look, it is reflex.

You feel the weight lift off a little just enough for you to worm yourself around to look up at the giant hand and arm way above you. Then a moment of pain, fear and everything else as the weight slams down on you breaking bones, and crushing your neck on the Adam’s apple. You die in a moment like as blood stops rushing to your brain and understanding fades into void.

The plastic bottle twists grinding the smashed tissue severing the head of what had been a human being as if it were nothing but an insignificant insect. The head, the only thing intact holds Scott’s surprised expression as it tumbles down bouncing off of his mothers thigh to roll down under the seat of the car. It comes to rest next to an old wrapper and discarded pencil.

Karen turns on the radio to distract Cathy. Out of the corner of her eye she sees something leaking out the side of the cup holder. “Uh, Cathy, what is leaking?”

Cathy looks down at the cup holder and frowns. Lifting the bottle up with ease she sees some red gunk under it and more in the cup holder. “I don’t know,” she says and finds an old napkin to wipe it up in. With out a care after it is cleaned she tosses the remains of her son into a plastic bag for Karen to throw away later.

Cathy later wonders where her son is and after two days calls the police and there is a picture of him on a milk-carton but no one finds him. Karen graduates and goes to college and the other girls grow up but her only son is never forgotten. She likes to believe he is out there somewhere, maybe with a family of his own. She never guesses that the only remains of him were vacuumed up years ago the next time Karen cleaned her car…

Now that you're free of the person who's so dumb to mistake her son for a doll, you dust off, crack your thighs, and try to walk to the house to get some help. However, you barely make it two steps before the leg of a giant girl blocks your path. Looking up, you see a...

"Poor dolly, you need a home don't you?" she asks.

Instantly, you take off running. There's no way you're going to be a little girl's doll! You can hear the giggling giantess right behind you. The girl's hand wraps around you. Her huge fingers wrap around your body as she lifts you up to her face.

"Gotcha!" She giggled. "What a neat little dolly, it can move around almost as if it were a real little person!"

You fight down a groan, she thought you were just some kind of animationic doll or something.

"I know JUST the place to keep you, you'll stay there FOREVER to be showered with love little doll." the girl says.

1111211221221221.content:
The little girl, named Michelle, holds you close to her chest as she runs back to her house. She goes up into her room and shuts the door, then opens up her drawer full of dolls. You are not the only living thing back here. Behind you are three ant scouts looking for a new food source. They were some of the first things in the house you managed to come to understand, ants didn’t attack as long as you stayed out of their way, but they had no problem if you crossed their path, these weren’t hunters they only looked for death things and left over food. They’re about the size of dogs, or at least what a dog your size would be like. Being only an inch tall, maybe less really changed your perspective.

In your hands you hold an old toothpick that you managed to sharpen again into a nice spear. You are covered by a makeshift lowing cloth, and cape. It was useful because you had managed to tare peaces into strips you could wrap around your waist, and feet, making a kind of wrapping boots and covering for your junk. The cape was what was left. It was also your blanket. Its real value was that for some odd reason Buttons didn’t want to come near it.

You suspected that the smell of the cloth was from urine, if the cat took it in the litter box or something. You had gotten used to the smell but Buttons never wanted to touch it. When you were wrapped in it the damn cat would normally leave you alone…normally. That was what you were looking out for right now. By the end of the first week you learned that going out during the day was stupid, you never got anywhere and people only came closer to killing you. It was a hard decision but you had resigned yourself to survival first and help second, if ever.

You figure it is about midnight, you think Sunday but are not sure. You had come out for your first real food run since you started this whole survivor mind set. You had managed to get into the kitchen the night before without incident but had to wait the day before making a move. You had hidden out in the cleaning closet, the far back corner. There had been a small brown spider there but you had been prepared. When the little bastard had tried to take you, you had wrapped yourself in the cape. It bit into the material. While it got caught in the material you let the cape fall off and stabbed the harry monster in the back of the head and several eyes several times. It died and curled up like spiders do. No one had bothered you while you slept.

Now you ventured out into the dark kitchen. Without all the giants around…you mean, your sisters or mom…strange you didn’t call them that anymore in your mind. You hadn’t spoken to someone in so long, when was the last time you talked? FOCUS. You bring your mind back on task. The pantry was only a little ways away but you had to cover open ground. The tile floor was clear of obstruction accept a sandal Shannon had left the day before, no worry to you, there was time. But Buttons did prowl around at night.

You liked to know where the cat was before making a move. There was no sign of the fur-ball. You step out from behind the fridge and move forward, your head always moving. You don’t run, there is no reason to and if the cat was watching it only would attract its attention. You head for a space under the kitchen table. By one of the legs you take another survey of the kitchen. The floor is clean; the gai…Mom must have swept recently. You continue to the closed door that you know is the pantry. Placing your back against the door you take one more look around.

Still all clear, you then get on your stomach and crawl under the door. It is easy; with your vigorous life style and little food you lost lots of weight. If you looked at yourself in the mirror you would hardly recognize yourself. You figure. By feel you knew you were growing a beard, though not a very full one and your hair was getting longer but not unmanageable. Grooming wasn’t a big thing for you yet.

It is pitch black inside the pantry but you are pretty sure you can navigate by touch. The next problem was getting up high enough to find something you could actually get into. The lower shelves are all full of cans, and you don’t have anything to cut them with. No you needed to get up to the higher shelves where the bags were. You didn’t have many tools when you came up with this plan so you didn’t know if you could get the food back with you but you had to try...
