Your world is in total chaos. You hear the word "Son" from your giant mom's lips, just as you think you are saved you and the spoon come crashing onto a soft surface. You examine your surroundings. A leg. The spoon and you fell onto your mom's right thigh as she fell out of her chair and fainted. Well, Now you've got to figure out how to deal with this situation. Should you take a break for a while and do a little exploring? It seems wrong, and weird too. But it is a gigantic woman. Your better instincts tell you that you need to wake her up. But how?
1422122.title: Seen?

choices: You get up and try to follow Aunt Tara (Where did she go)
Try and get downstairs (Find Mom)
Stay where you are (Maybe someone will come and see you)
Kim, your girlfriend comes over (She has been looking for you)
Run back to your room (Your room is the safest place you know)
15.content:
You are on your back laid out after the fall when the boom, boom, boom, Boom, Boom, BOOM, BOOM sound start vibrating through the thick carpet. You shot up into a sitting position and turn around to look at the direction of the stairs. Right before your eyes like an old monster movie a giant emerges over the horizon and comes your way. You are too shocked to move but not to realize who it is, Aunt Tara, one of you mom’s older sisters. BOOM, BOOM, BOOM.

Once she fully emerges over the horizon you get a hold over yourself enough to get up and run. You’re in the middle of the hall way and her path. As you start running not caring where you go your head instinctively turns back and all you see in your field of vision is black pillars coming your way. You hit the base board, you must have run to the left, and fall back.

You keep your eyes on the pillars and raise your head back trying to see Aunt Tara’s head or long blond hair but you can’t get past the wide hips of her business skirt. As your gaze goes back down as she passes you buy in the Boom, Booming steps you notice the stiletto heals, and the arch of the foot.

You were never a foot man yourself but now you noticed especially when you know deep down that those are your natural enemies now. At normal size they must have been 4 or 5 inches, but to you they were four or five times your own height. Boom, Boom, Boom, the vibrations fade as you see those high, black heels turn the corner and disappear.
15.title: Here's Tara

choices: The purse is knocked over and all its contents fall around you
Aunt Tara finishes and just picks up the bag with no notice of you
151.content:
You recover from your initial shock and the obvious thing to do is go after Aunt Tara. You need help. You pick yourself up and start running back the way you came were Aunt Tara had stomped off to before she turned the corner. The new carpet your Mom had just ordered was thick and made movements hard and itchy but you were able to cross the hall in good time. Holding yourself close to the dash board you turn the corner and look to hopefully see Aunt Tara. Unfortunately there was no one.

You look down the hall and realize she must have gone into one of the rooms. There was the hall bathroom, next to that was the hall closet but she wouldn’t be in there. On the other side is Kelly’s room then Shannon’s room and Sarah’s nursery. Your room was at the very end of the hall but no one, except your mom, went in there. The door behind you was your mom’s room but you know Aunt Tara didn’t go in there because you would have seen her. Then the answer is presented to you with the loud sound of runny water coming very distinctly from the bathroom.

With your mind made up you start heading for the bathroom door. Fortunately it was the closest of the doors anyway. You make your way to the giant closed door. Not even thinking as to what Aunt Tara would be doing in a bathroom you in desperation to get help dive under the door. You fit with plenty of room and come up on the other end.

Oh crap…literally. You get up and are immediately faced with the giant white toilette and on that toilet sitting, reading a CASMO magazine with her skit and stockings down around her ankles is your humongous aunt. (A quick description of Aunt Tara: she is the oldest of five children, has no children of her own because she has spent all her time being the over achiever in Harvard, Oxford and maybe even Yale. She is a prim and proper woman that has kept a slim figure, mostly because of no children. She works insane hours as a CEO of some business empire with her several other unknown partners. She would be an attractive lady if she let her hair down once in a while and let lose. It was only in the last year that she has been coming over to spend time with her sisters, which is a possible sign of a mid-life crisis, were she is realizing that work isn’t the only thing in life, but she might not be there just yet. Now back to the story)

You are staring at this giant woman using the toilet so needless to say you are stunned. Wasn’t thinking that was going to be what you saw. Instead however of turning around and going back outside you run forward and too the left to hide yourself feeling completely embarrassed, like that makes any difference in your condition. You run across the bathroom matt unknown to your aunt because of her nose being in the magazine and the place you choose to run too is behind the oversized purse resting against the wall. You run behind it and lean against it thinking this is the worst thing you could possibly have done.

There is a loud sound of movement on the other side of the purse you are hiding behind. You pick out to see what Aunt Tara is doing. BOMB, BOMB…those two giant black stiletto shoes land right in front of you and turn. The sound of water is again heard, Aunt Tara is washing her hands. You let your eyes travel up the back of the giant heels to those black nylon legs and to the dark business skirt that is so high like it is a giant living building.
151.title: Found Aunt Tara, Wish You Didn't

choices: You get scooped up into Aunt Tara’s purse
You are beat-up but not picked up
1511.content:
Without any warning Aunt Tara reaches back with out looking to grab her purse. You instinctively drop to the ground smothering yourself in the bathroom mat. A loud rustle comes from above and you look up just in time to see an avalanche of things much bigger than you come falling down right on top of you.

“Damn!” Tara says to herself. She had accidentally knocked over her purse and all its contents were rolling over the bathroom floor. A compact here and open tube of lipstick, a tampon her hair brush, and a whole bunch of other things. She moved over to the toilet and had to bend her legs and lower herself on to the balls of her feet because in this tight business skirt she didn’t have the mobility to bend over and started gathering all the things back into her bag.

You look up after trying to cover yourself from the fall of giant things. You had been hit and rolled around a bit but holding your head down and wrapping yourself in the fetal position had saved you from most of the bruising. You get up and slowly look around. There are giant plastic ovals and blocks all around you. Some are about your size but many are bigger and it is everywhere. You turn slowly taking it all but when you turn behind yourself you jump back, a giant black heel is hovering in mid air about 5 feet over you. You jump back and bump into something. It is at that moment that the giant heel comes down BOOM as the giant spike slams into the ground you shaken to the ground as the floor reverberates. Good thing you jumped back or you would have been right under your aunt’s heel. But you take in a breath of reel too soon because the humongous heel is then lifted up and you are quivering in fear of the giant mass as it moves over you.

Tara steps over a bunch of stuff and starts shoveling things back into her bag.
1511.title: On The Floor By The Giant Heel

choices: Aunt Tara stops to have Tea with Cathy, your mom
Aunt Tara is going Home
15111.content:
You are sprawled on the ground with all the giant objects. You reach out and use a giant prescription bottle to support yourself as you stand up. Then BOOM, BOOM a shadow falls over you and WAMB you are sent flying along the ground. WAMB you go rolling again.

Tara quickly lays her back on its side wide open and starts shoveling in all the things that had gone over the floor. Bottles lip stick tampon cell phone etc. All of it was tossed carelessly into the giant purse then she stood up and lifted the bag’s strap over her shoulder.

You go rolling along and are then plunged into darkness. Shoot where the HEEELLLLL! You are sent rolling and something big and hard runs you over and the world seems to spin. Finally everything starts to calm down except for the continuous up and down rhythm. It feels like you are swaying…What is going on? You still don’t make the connection that you are small enough to be inside a purse.

Tara exited the bathroom and went back down stairs. And
15111.title: Go For A Ride

choices: You take the chance and dive out of the purse
You role around but do not make it out before Tara picks it up
151111.content:
Tara heads down the stairs. “By Sis, but I must be going. I have a long night of reviewing e-mails.” Tara hugs Cathy and her purse slips from her shoulder down to her arm.

“Oh, do you have to leave so soon, why not stay for a cup of tea? I just made some.”

Tara considered, “Well…”

“Come on, we have barely spent any time together.”

“Alright.” The two women went to the dining room table and Tara sat down while Cathy went to pore the tea. She set her purse next to the chair and crossed her legs.

Inside the dark You are knocked around with the constant motion of the bag. You can’t see very well except for the bit of light coming in from the top. You put your arms up into protective block when some large tube like thing falls against you. There is a sudden drop and for a moment you are weightless and bounce when you hit the bottom of the bag.

You are buried under the loose content of the bag when everything comes to a halt. Slowly you rise and the debris falls away from you. “Oh,” you say to yourself if for no other reason than to hear yourself speak. You move a bit and look around again. Everything is very still. “How am I going to get out of here?”

Tara and Cathy start to converse about work and kids. Tara was very interested in hearing how Scott her nephew was doing. She liked the boy, as he got older perhaps he could do an internship in the company. Absentmindedly her leg crossed over the other starts to sway up and down. She sips her tea finishing it off. “That was lovely Sis, we should do this more often.”

“Yes, we should.” Cathy agreed.

Tara turned in her seat and her foot swung around and tapped her purse and for the second time it fell over…
151111.title: Aunt Tara stops to have Tea with Cathy

1511111.content:
you feel a jarring smack from an external force. you can tell that the purse is falling over. your mind goes back and forth between thinking it's a good thing because you'll out and a bad thing because something could fall on you. the bag hits the floor with tremendous force and you are thrown out along with several other objects.

Aunt Tara sees this happens and says "SHIT." under her breathe. Cathy overhears this and says "WHAT IS IT?". you're a tiny bit stunned from the impact but you can hear the two giant women's voices overhead. you see Aunt Tara uncross her sky-scraper legs as she turns to your Mom and answers "I JUST KNOCKED MY PURSE OVER AGAIN." the two continue to talk for a second about where you could be and why you aren't around at the moment.

Cathy then leans to the side to take a glance at her Sister's mishap. you stagger to your feet and start jumping and yelling "AUNT TARA! HELP ME! HELP! HEY!" but she can't hear you at your pathetic size. she then looks back down at the spilled contents in a motion to sweep them back into the bag once again. "NOOOO! NO AUNT TARA! STOP!" you yell once more but she just continues. her hand comes down to the floor and begins to sweep the scattered pieces back to their place.

you don't want to be thrown into her purse again and have the chance of being squished by something, so you make a run for it. you sprint for about 10 seconds and then you hear "EW. YOU HAVE A BUG IN HERE CATHY!" from your Aunt. you spin around quickly hoping she was talking about something else, but she is looking directly at you.

you hear a creak from the other chair and see your Mom leaning over to look at what Tara is talking about. you then see her lips move and her thunderous voice say "YEAH, JUST SQUISH IT." you wonder to yourself just how your Mom could be so cruel! how could she sentence her own son to death via her sister? Tara then pushes out her chair and you see her massive structure take a two steps towards and and stand over top of your body.

"AUNT TARA DON'T DO IT! IT'S ME SCOTT!" you scream up to her, but to her you are nothing but a nasty bug needed to be killed off. on either side of you, you see her huge feet in those stilettos you loved so much. Tara then picks up her right foot and it seems to hover above you for a short period of time. "UGH. NASTY LITTLE THINGS" Tara says before she lowers her foot onto you. "NOOO-" is all that you get out before she sets her weight on top of you and crushes you. you die almost immediately.

Tara gives the "bug" a few twists to grind it down for good measure. some of your remains stay on the floor while some stick to the bottom of her stiletto. she then leans over and picks up her purse. Tara looks to your Mom, Cathy and says "THOSE LITTLE THINGS ALWAYS ANNOY ME SO MUCH. I GOT HIM GOOD THOUGH. I NEED TO GO HOWEVER, LET ME KNOW WHEN YOU SEE SCOTT."

Cathy responds with "YEAH I HATE THEM TOO. THANKS FOR KILLING IT. I WOULD HAVE BUT I'M IN BAREFEET RIGHT NOW. GOOD TO SEE YOU." your Aunt leaves without a second to thought, unaware that she just ended the life of her nephew. Cathy finishes off her tea and grabs a kleenex. she actually unknowingly steps on your remains on her way to get it. she walks to your remains and wipes them up and throws them out. she too unaware that she had sentenced her own son to death by her Sister's foot.

a few days later your Mom calls the police worried, but nothing is ever found out and within a few years you are forgotten.
1511111.title: Whoops

choices: Aunt Tara Vacuums You Up
Spared From The Vacuum For Now
151112.content:
You're starting to feel like you have motion sickness from the swaying of the purse. It's dark in the purse and there are all kinds of different smell. Lipstick... makeup... gum... the leather of the purse... perfume... all kinds of things all blended together. The motion of the swaying... the smells... and weight of everything pressing against you has you starting to feel sick to your stomach. Yout feel like you're about to puke when all the swaying motion stops.

You hear what sounds like a car door and close. Then you feel like you're flying for a moment as Tara tosses her purse onto the floor of the car. You hear the sound of a car starting up and then sounds of a car driving. You can hear the tire noise on pavement and as they go over bumps. You can feel the lurching of the car as it traveled along. You know that the ride to your Aunt's house is usually a long one from the couple of times that you've gone there with your parents. You resign yourself to taking a nap because you're not sure what's in store for you once you get to your Aunt's house.

Aunt Tara finally gets home. You hear the garage door open and close. Then sound of her heels on the floor as she walks through her house. You feel yourself swaying wildly and contents of the purse batter you. You begin yelling for your Aunt... hoping she'll hear your cries for help but she can't hear you. She goes into her bed room and spills the contents of her purse onto her bed... muttering under her breath about how stupid she was to dump the purse in the bathroom.

You see your Aunt's giant hand foraging through the contents sprawled across the conforter of her bed. She is quick to re-pack the contents back into the assigned pockets and pouches in her purse. You're doing your best to stay away from her hand as she grabs the different items. You make several attempts to het your Aunt's attention by yelling but she doesn't hear you because she's got her I-Pod and the ear buds are in.

You watch your Aunt close up her purse and sling it over her arm. The purse sways wildly as she scoops you up with the remaining items from the comforter. She quickly turns and stumbles slightly as her heel catches in the carpeting. She loses her balance and knocks over a huge potted plant next to her dresser and drops all of the stuff she had in her hands including you.

You tumble to the floor and land in the dirt and dried leaves from the plant. There's dirt scattered everwhere. You hear your Aunt swearing under her breath as she kneels down to starts to scoop up the dirt from the carpet. You hear your Aunt mutter that she'll need to vacuum the rest up.

You cringe when hear the word “Vacuum” and watch nervously as Aunt Tara goes to the closet in the hallway and retieves her vacuum cleaner. You watch nervously as she rolls her very old looking canister vacuum into the room and plugs it in. You have to get off of the floor or get under something so you won't be vacuumed up with the rest of the dirt.

Then you hear a click and the deafening roar of the vacuum as Aunt Tara turned it on and began vacuuming the room. You know there would be no escape from suction of the vacuum and dash for safety hoping that hiding under the night stand will keep you safe. You press yourself against the wall looking for a better place to hide. Sure you wanted to get her attention before... but you need to get her attention now… but how? and now as the moment draws near... you're too afraid to move as the thunderous roars of the vacuum cleaner comes closer and closer to your little hiding place.

As Aunt Tara pushes the giant machine back and forth across the carpet, you cower in the corner, telling yourself “Just make it go away…make it all go away.” You are frozen with fear knowing it wouldn’t be long before Aunt Tara will be vacuuming under the night stand. Should you make a run for it? Would Aunt Tara stop if she saw you? What if she didn't?

Time is running out though as Aunt Tara continues to vacuum the room, totally oblivious to your presence… or is she? Would she really vacuum you up if she saw you under the night stand? It isn’t long before you can see Aunt Tara’s high heeled foot in front of the night stand pushing the vacuum back and forth across the carpet. You can hear the dirt and leaves traveling through the long silver wand and hose as they're sucked up from the carpeting. You can feel the vibrations of the floor attachment on the floor now as Aunt Tara vacuums right in front of your little hiding place. Then Aunt Tara stops and gets down on her knees. You can see as she grabs the hose... disconnects the long silver wand and pushes an attachment onto the vacuum nozzle. You jump to your feet as the attachment enters your safe hole and probes for dirt and dust bunnies.

“WAIT! STOP! AUNT TARA… WAIT!”

You scream as loud as you can. But by the time you yell it was too late. The suction was beginning to pull at you. The sound from the vacuum cleaner was deafening and the suction was getting overwhelming. Dust bunnies and dirt were disappearing into the opening of the attachment making funny slurping sounds. You try to resist the suction by holding onto the carpet as you continued to scream to Aunt Tara in a vain attempt to make yourself heard over the roar of the vacuum.

“AUNT TARA ! MY GOD PLEASE ! I’M NOT A DUST BUNNY! AUNT TARA STOP! BE CAREFUL! STOP! CAN’T YOU SEE ME UNDER HERE? STOP IT ! STOP! STOP ! MY GOD YOU’RE GOING TO SUCK ME UP AUNT TARA! TURN OFF THE VACUUM CLEANER!” But alas that is all it was, vain.

Aunt Tara pushed the hose closer and closer until it's nearly right on you. Your fingers are now getting sore from gripping onto the carpet. Your fingers begin to slip from their hold on the carpet fibbers as the bristles of the attachment were literally touching your feet. The powerful suction of the vacuum cleaner was not about to give up… The pain was becoming immense… it was going to either be your arms or the carpet, and the shaggy fibbers of the rug seemed to give no hint of fatigue. You know it's going to be you... you're going to have to give in, it was inevitable. Your fingers slip just a little bit more until you're holding onto almost nothing at all. Your little body is extended fully toward the howling vortex of the attachment feet first.

“NO…NO...NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO”

You yell but your screams for help are totally muffled out by the roar of the vacuum cleaner. You claw and hold your arms out to the bitter end...Was this to be your fate? Vacuumed up like a little dust bunny?
151112.title: Aunt Tara-fying

choices: You go to the bathroom, and venture under the giant bed for what could miles
Go around the bed to the giant closet, maybe something you could use or hide in
1511122.content:
As if a divine spirit was finally listening to you the suction stops and you fall flat on your face. <What the heck?> you waste no time jumping to your feet and running to the far corner of the stand and trying to wedge yourself between the wall and the leg. Once in you gasp for air. Your heart is beating like crazy. <Oh man, I…I was almost sucked up…like…like I was nothing> You have been shrunk for less than a day and it dawns on you that you’re just a bug to this world of giants. Your own family could kill you, flatten you from existence, and never notice. Your thoughts are filled with images of your mom wondering what happened to you and…and. “NO!” you scream out. That is not happening to me.

On the outside Tara felt her cellular phone buzz and stopped her i-pod to answer it. “Yes…Uha…Okay, close the account…WHAT! THAT MORONE! JUST WAITE I’M COMING TO THE OFFICE RIGHT NOW!” She grabs her purse and briefcase behind her walk-in closet door and practically runs out. Runs as much as her high heels would let her. The bedroom door slams shut behind her.

“WHAT!” You clasp your hands over your ears as a BOOMING almost godlike voice bombards you. Then there is the BOOM, BOOM, BOOM in rapid succession and SLAM! What just happened? You poke your head out from the side. Nothing. Slowly you come out of your wedged space and peak out some more. No giant heels. A giant silvery pipe the size of a train is lying motionless on the ground. <She left?>

You come out fully and walk to the giant mettle rod; to you it is a giant pipe, like the kind used to move large amounts of oil. It is surprisingly easy to move because the carpet is so new and soft that you are more bouncing on top of the closely woven fibers than wading through them like at home. Aunt Tara can afford the best. Okay what now?

You remember what your Aunt’s house looks like from past visits. It was big by normal peoples’ standards so it would be like a fortress to you now. That goes without saying. You turn in circles trying to think of what to do. There is a giant door about a mile or more from you. That is the bedroom door. That would be your first choice accept you remembered your last visit…(MEMORY_ you walk in to the house last year and a giant brown dog with all this fur charges you laying you flat on your back…RUSS) Your Aunt’s Dog, a trophy from a business rival she conquered. Took everything the sap had even his dog. If Russ was still around…no not going outside.

You look for another option. Don’t want to stay on the floor that was almost the end before you had a chance to get help. You see and giant black door like way father to the right and partially blocked by the edge of your Aunt’s massive bed. Don’t know what that is. Then you can also guess her bathroom is probably on the other side of the bed. <I could go under the bed and make my way there. If I get to the sink she would see me when she went to get ready for bed.> Some merits.

You decide to

Note: Aunt Tara is rich so lots of nice and fancy stuff. Bathroom is huge, with jet tubs and you name it tile floor etc. The black void is a giant walk in closet with fur coats and shoes and boxes from fancy stores, remember big big big..

The guest room (her room)

You have a few bruises but you'll be okay, as you realize Aunt Tara is bent down shoveling stuff into her purse you see that her stiletto heel is right in front of you. Her massive tip of her big toe and second toe sticking out.

If you could touch the massive toes you just might be able to get her attention. You climb to the small section where they were and you see your Aunt is done! That means she is about to move! You see a very tiny piece of dead skin peeling off the bottom of her big toe and you hold on to it as she walks out of the bathroom too...
15112.title: Stiletto Toes

choices: Cathy digs around in the dirt then leaves the dirty yard shoes outside
Cathy works up a sweat and goes to get a shower, leaves mules in the bathroom
151121.content:
The world is a blure of color. You go up then come crashing down. As you fall your lifted up and have to hand on to your aunt's foot. WUSH, SLAMB, WUSH, SLAMB, WUSH, SLAMB. You couldn't do anything but hang on to the rolarcoster that was simply your mom's sister's casual steps from the bathroom down the stiars and to the living room.

With each rising and the bone breaking crashes you could feel your grip givng way. In your mind's eye you saw yourself flying off into oblivion which only made you hold on even harder, CRASH, CRASH, CRASH.

Then finally it happened, your grip gave way and you went skyward...


Tara found Cathy in the living room. "Cathy, I have to go to work but we'll meet up for dinner."

Cathy got up and went over to hug her sister. "Alright, sorry you missed the kids. I was planning on doing some yard work today anyway." Cathy walked Tara to the door. Closing the door behind her older sister Cathy sighed, "well better get to it, not like the day is going to get any cooler."

Cathy walked back into the living room and found a pair of chunky brown open back mules. She had been barefoot since she threw her socks into the washer with the rest of the laundry. She casually slipped one foot into the left mule then the right foot. She then went out the back door. She had just figured her son was out somerwhere, little did she know.


You had no idea what had happened. Your hold had broken and you went flying. It had been the most tarifiying experience of your life and you just knew you were going to hit the ground and die. There wasn't a shred of hope. Then "UFFFF," you hit on tomething and then went roling. You felt your body go head over heals then SLAMB, you were upside down and wedged against something, a wall. You blinked, there was no comprehentsion in what had just happened.

You slumped over and fell forward. On your hands and knees you tried to get some sense of clarity. It was dark, ow, your shoulder felt like it was burning...it as realy dark. Why am I not dead? That was one of many questions, not the least of which was how you got to be shrunk in the first place. But there were no answers. You just stayed there dazed and in shock.

There were loud deep voices coming from the openeing of a cave. You were in a cave...there were no caves in your house...slowy you make your way to the light clutching your injured shoulder. You could understand the sounds before they registered to their importance..."SORRY YOU MISSED THE KIDS...!" out side you blinked seeing the light. way off in the distance what looked like miles you saw Mom, in the doorway. Beyond her was the tall regal figure of Aunt Tara. Then Mom closed the door and turned coming back.

You watched her coming. She looked so different, so BIG! She was oblivious to you, and before too long she was so close you couldn't see all of her without turnning up your head. "...BETTER GET TO IT, NOT LIKE THE DAY IS GOING TO GET ANY COOLER!" Mom thunders way above you. You just stare dumfounded as she comes evern closer. You are just looking up at her.

It wasn't till she was towerign over you that something told you that this wasn't a good place to be. But by then it was too late. The sound got to you first. The sound of leather bending and lots and lots of material folding, Your head turned to the side were you saw your mom's giant foot rise and then decend fitting itself into a boat, a giant brown tub of a shoe...instantly you head wiped to right infront of you. The giant foot rose up above you. You reacted by jumping back and ended up rolling back into the cave...but it wasn't a cave and you knew it...You saw it hapend and there wasn't a damn thing you could do about it.

The cave enterance was blotted out and you saw the biggest foot ever, even bigger than Tara's come in invading your space and rushing towards you. There wasn't time to react..."AHHHHH!" You screamed and you were hit from the front and over come. You went flying to the backand then were being sandwitched between to masses, giant toes.

You tried to scream but in the disaster tha followed there was nothing you could have done. You felt the world shift and then RISE, BOOM, your body vibrated with shockwaves. WUSH CRASH...it was even worse than wining from Tara's toe, now you were trapped and space was only being lost, as you were over come and your head and shoulders started to hit the cealing, I'm going to die, I'm going to die, you knw it. There was nothing you could do.
151121.title: Brown Mules

choices: Crawl out to find the giant bathroom-thick with steam; Cathy is finishing up
Cathy hasn't begun yet; she needs to shake the dirt and rocks from her shoes
1511212.content:
Cathy used a trowel to dick in her flower garden. She crouched her heals rising out of the shoes as she put her weight on the balls of her feet. She lightly humbed a toon, then 'la'la'la'la," as she went along with her gardening. It wasn't the most productive work but her therapist had advised her to get a hobie. She leaned further forward sliding to her knees. One foot rose into the air and her shoe dangled from her toes. Cathy scooted back and leaned back to sit in the cool moist soil. "Fewww!"

Cathy wiped her arm over her forehead. She hadn't been out for very long but already she was starting to feel hot. But that only made it more important to get the plants firmly emplanted in the cool moist earth. She roled to the side shiftting her feet under her and sat on her left foot while she worked through the dirt cutting up a knew hole to fill.

After about two hours, Cathy got up and stood. She wiggled her toes, they felt sweety and warm int he lether shoes. Some dirt had also slipped in and she felt the pebbles shift and sqeez between her toes. "Time to get something to drink." She headed for the kitchen, "and a relaxing bubble bath."


You hadn't made it those two hours...Somehow you had managed to get wedged on top of your mom's foot and had been repeatidly slambed into the room of the shoe and had the giant toe-nail dig into your stomach. You ended up puking up everything in your stomach but that didn't end it. The temperature skyrocketed, but you didn't even notcie...with every second, every moment you were slambed, plowed, and compressed. Your puls was beating in your head, and every time you had even just a little bit of room, the best you could do was try and get a full intake of air only to have it forced from your chest or risk your lungs exploding from the pressure. You immediately start to turn around and head back to your room which is all the way around the corner and down the hall. You stay low and run keeping the wall to your right. Surprisingly it is hard to run because you keep falling calf deep into the new carpet. Damn. You keep going when you get the unpleasant feeling you were being watched.

You stop and turn around to your mom’s open door. It is a ways behind you now. Two big orange eyes are watching you. “Buttons!” you yell out. You turn around and take a step towards the giant animal then realized what you are doing…GIANT CAT! You freeze. You aren’t so stupid that you would run. If you do that the cat will be on you and an image of it playing with you like it did with a mouse last week forms in your mind. You could easily see yourself breaking bones and lying dead as your family pet chomps on you.

Just then there is a roar from down stairs. And a loud SHFAUHASHHSH, coming from across the hall. You are too scared to move but your mind reels with possibilities.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Cathy drops the laundry in the laundry room and grabs the vacuum. She starts at the top of the steps and starts heading into the hall about to turn the corner…

Tara finishes her business in the bathroom and flushes…

Buttons starts to creep forward.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Screw instinct you make a break for it leaving the wall and running away from the cat as fast as you can…
1553.title: The damn cat shows up

info.brief_description: What happens when you shrink inside your own home?
info.description:
You - Scott, 18 years old.

He lives with mom and 3 sisters, his dad left them after Sarah was born.......

Cathy (Your mother) - 37 years old. She has always been a good mother, always caring about her kids. That is when they are normal size at least. She tries to keep in shape, but like most mothers, she can't keep looking like she is 20. Thick women with brown hair.

Kelly - 16 years old. You and kelly have always been close, but you have always had your arguments. She has always been told she is a younger version of her mother. She has brown hair with blond highlights. She is a skinny girl, with a great figure.

Shannon - 7 years old. She has always been the more tomboy sister. She enjoys playing with bugs, and running around. She always seemed a bit weird with how she treated bugs, but hey she is only 7.

Sarah - 3 years old. What can you say about her. Shes only 3 years old.

Todd (Your father) - 39 years old. He is now dating another women. You don't see him much anymore.

Tina - 32 years old. She is your dad's girlfriend. She seemed oddly fond of you though.

Kim (Your Girlfriend) - 19 years old. She is a great looking girl. Blond hair with blue eyes, not fat at all, just a great curvy figure. Not to mention very nice breasts.


Only a few rules really, and there just so everyone can enjoy this story and so it doesn't die along with alot of stuff on here. First thing is this is an Unaware Story, so I'd like to keep it so its unaware, now with that in mind, I don't mind if he is seen or caught for a little, as long as he is then made unaware again. For example, a child can find him but then lose him. No one planned this to happen, it was not a potion, or a bracelet, or whatever else. Along with that, no one can change his size, he can't grow or shrink more. Scott himself is not gay, but he can run into gay characters and be forced into situations, but its not his choice. Since this is my story I don't care about age, I don't care if you add characters, and whatever you want to do with animals is fine with me.
